data.eml:eml: This datasource is comprised of two surveys undertaken in the Ravensthorpe Range between 2007 (200 quadrats) and 2009 (66 quadrats). The Ravensthorpe Range was sampled at a higher density than the BIF and greenstone survey, has had separate mapping across the range and is a major centre of diversity.For more information on this dataset visit the BIF theme page by clicking on Themes | Banded Iron Formations (BIF) in the main menu.
